website_summaries.verdict: A duvet cover set that gets solid raves for its softness and lightweight construction.
pros: This duvet is not only lightweight and soft-feeling, but it also stands out for holding up over time, having beautiful color, and being good quality
cons: Some consumers reported receiving damaged items, and it doesn't hold the duvet insert down as well as other models

website_summaries.verdict: Budget price, but for quality, we recommend other bedding sets that are more durable and functional.
pros: A basic 3-piece set that comes in a variety of stylish colors
Soft, lightweight feel is ideal for warm months
Shams and comforter cover fit well
cons: Crooked stitching and loose threads in some areas
The cover attaches with buttons, which occasionally come unfastened

customer_reviews.title: It's just polyester fabric.
customer_reviews.text: POLYESTER, POLYESTER, POLYESTER! No matter how fancy is the description is, these are just 100% polyester. I don't think it's comparable to cotton, and I don't think it's very comfortable or fine made. The description makes a huge misunderstanding of what it made of. I feel like I've been fooled.
customer_reviews.author: Manadita

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. First of all it is described in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. First of all it is described in a tricky way saying its 1500 count Egyptian leads you to think its cotton when in fact its polyester. It does not wash well and it holds onto pet hair even after washing. Had it for a month and gave it to a resale shop. And its so hot to sleep under because its not cotton. Very disappointed. I should demand my money back. Awful product.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: I FEEL LIKE A QUEEN...
customer_reviews.text: Let me just tell whoever is seeing this review that YOU HAVE TO GET THESE! I'm getting it in every color. I've been in need of nrw sheets I've put off buying because they have to feel exquisite which usually adds up to very expensive. This duvet makes me feel like I'm sleeping in the softest, most luxurious cloud. It manages to make the comforter cool when needed or warm when needed. I LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Just my opinion!

customer_reviews.title: NO STARS
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY AS OTHERS HAVE STATED CAME WITH STAINS ON OVER AND PILLOW CASE DISGUSTING!!!
customer_reviews.author: sofie

customer_reviews.title: Reminder than more reviews doesn't lead to quality...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bunch of expensive bedding and then remembered I needed a white comforter cover. Looking for a good deal, I just found the cheapest one I could find with the best ratings. I am not necessarily disappointed with my purchase, but this is really nothing special. The material is very thin and it doesn't look like it will last for long. I am happy with the price, but since I will probably have to replace it before too long, I'm not sure the savings are really worth it. Next time I won't be cheap and I will buy something that's slightly better quality.
customer_reviews.author: HannaLei

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it-
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Doesn’t fit with a standard king insert- it always bunches up. It’s not cotton like it says- it’s a polyester blend. It’s constantly wrinkly. Not happy with this product at all-I never send things back on Amazon but I’m definitely sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for - mine was filthy
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed in this item. Everything looked great until I opened the packaging and pulled out the duvet. While it is very soft and comortable feeling, I couldn't help but notice the filth that covered it. It looked like someone had run over it with their car and there were places where it appeared to be mildewing. Also mine was covered in large pinkish/brown pieces of fuzzy material. The threading on the seams also seemed to be coming out - it is poorly made. I was so disgusted by this product and am very disappointed in the seller for sending me something that appears to be used and filthy.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Stained
customer_reviews.text: Stains on it and I haven't even taken it out of the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Runs for Days!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I received my duvet cover but the excitement was short lived as when I opened it there were already two runs!! I'm thoroughly disappointed in the quality simply because of the runs at the bottom. One run is about a foot long from the button hole upward as well as downward and the second run is in the same spot only a different button hole and is about 8". This product is super soft and great except for that! Wish I had one that wasn't faulty!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon's Choice loses credibility to me
customer_reviews.text: Went on to buy a specific duvet cover and Amazon had an Amazon's Choice on another one that read: Hotel Luxury 3pc Duvet Cover Set-1500 Thread Count Egyptian Quality Ultra Silky Soft Top Quality Premium Bedding Collection -Queen Size White. No where in that headline does it say MICROFIBER i.ee POLYESTER. The bedding is soft but has that plastic like pull to it - doesn't breathe and doesnt sit right when you insert duvet to duvet cover. I think they need to see and feel a set of 1500 thread count egyptian cotton sheets and bedding before promoting this extremely misleading headline for polyester. Returning today
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Decent for Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cream queen size. The color is DEFINITELY not cream- more of a khaki or light brown, which was really disappointing and has kind of thrown my room off. The fit was perfect. Would be nicer if it had the ties or buttons to keep duvet in place. Feel is okay, just your average polyester microfiber softness. All in all, decent for the price; was mostly let down by the misleading color photo/description.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT Egyptian Cotton! 100% Brushed Microfiber
customer_reviews.text: There is no cotton in this product,cheap chinese made microfiber. Microfiber does not have a thread count nor does the pa kage state a thread count. This is either bait and switch or false advertisement both of which are illegal. Tags are written in broken English. False Advertisement contacting Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: USMCSurvivalist85

customer_reviews.title: Missing a Critical Component
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those products that would have gotten a great review but somehow the designer/manufacturer missed a critical component. Duvets have a loop on each corner designed to accept a button or ties located on the cover. Somehow this duvet doesn't have them making it difficult to keep the duvet from folding when in use. Otherwise, the cover is of good quality and sized correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sturgeon

customer_reviews.title: Good but a few issues
customer_reviews.text: I do love this duvet cover's color and softness, and it seems to be made well. However, it seems to stain very easily. Anything that is a tiny bit greasy (maybe skin oil or deodorant or??) leaves a smudge, and then if I don't catch it to pre-treat before washing, it is stuck there. So now after less than a year, I'm having to replace it because it looks a bit shabby. I also would prefer a zipper in the bottom instead of the buttons. They just take so long to undo and do up again. And I bought the duvet cover so that I could wash it regularly after guests, instead of having to always wash the comforter/insert.
customer_reviews.author: nburcham

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice, color off
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to put on but is ever so slightly big for my full-sized comforter. It's easy enough to straighten out the wrinkles, however, so no big deal. It's super soft and feels luxurious. I was, however, a little disappointed in the color (sage). Most everything I buy that is labeled sage is a little greener than this cover was. This sage was a little more of a brownish green than other sage things I have. The color that shows on the description looks more green than what I got. So, it doesn't really match my sheets but my curtains have a few ranges of greens and sages so it ties in.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Dey

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive, poor quality product, I'm definitely gonna be returning it
customer_reviews.text: The product description does everything possible to hide the fact that this is polyester, but it is. If you read the attached tag, you'll see that it's not even bleachable, which completely defeats the purpose of a white duvet cover. The fabric is also far from 1500 yarn count, that part is a blatant lie. It's a cheap woven polyester fabric held together with as little thread as possible. The seams feel pretty weak, and I don't think they'll last long. I didn't think it was as unbearably warm as some people on here, but it's still a bit toasty. Gonna be returning this in the next few days.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Perfect decorating decision at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I'd never owned a duvet cover. I consistently purchase comforter sets and am either disappointed with their cost vs. longevity or find one that I cannot do without. My linen closet is full of less-than-perfect lumpy comforters. This is a perfect solution. It's the exact color I need. It's easy-care and I love the construction, good thread-count and easily protects or disguises a boring duvet or a wearing comforter. It was promptly delivered and as described. I'm converted.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Gery

customer_reviews.title: So SOFT
customer_reviews.text: Pros: SO SOFT!!! The cover and pillow cases are very soft. I haven't slept on them or under them yet, but both before and after washing, I found them to be wonderfully soft to the touch. Soft, soft, soft! It is a nice bright white fabric. Packaged well. Cons: The fabric seems a little thin. The opening for the pillow case is in the middle of the back of the case. There is nothing to hold it closed and flipping it over for use may not work out well. The duvet cover has button closure rather than zipper and the button holes have loose threads that catch the buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle A.

customer_reviews.title: No Zipper enclosure on bottom of duvet cover
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely worth the money I paid, but I am disappointed that the duvet does not have a zipper enclosure on the bottom -but buttons The description said either or so -For the price- I won't return. The pillow cases I have had to iron and they pucker at the flange and hard to iron out. I purchased these for my guest room hoping I would not have to iron.
customer_reviews.author: CINDY BRUGH-KIRCHUBEL

customer_reviews.title: This was a complete waist of money. Total junk
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. I should have just gone to Ikea. This is such bad quality I can not believe that Amazon is selling it. Stitching is terrible; it arrived with runs in the fabric. This likely would not survive a wash. I'm really upset with all of the junk items that Amazon is selling lately. They need a Quality Control team.
customer_reviews.author: Sansmerci

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, soft, but does NOT fit.
customer_reviews.text: In color and material, I would love to give it a 5+ star. It’s beautiful and soft and inviting. However, it does NOT have corner ties so my down comforter does not stay in place. And most importantly, the king size does NOT fit a king size comforter. It’s about a foot too wide and 6” too short. That alone has made me want to take it off and stick in the top shelf of my closet to be forgotten until the next closet cleaning. Disappointed, because I really wanted to keep it on my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron O'Hare

customer_reviews.title: I'm dumb.
customer_reviews.text: So I was wanting a new comforter because my old one is very girly because my ex wife picked it out. This is a COVER. That is my fault for not reading, so I was going to give this a solid review. However, I tried to cover my old comforter with this and it sucked. It is held together by flimsy clear buttons that rip off the cover after 2 days of use making it unusable. Just stay away from this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Elisha Lo

customer_reviews.title: Buttons pop off cover almost instantly!
customer_reviews.text: Let's start with the good: the color is exactly what I expected, the cover is super soft, and the cover fits my king-sized duvet. It holds up well to the washer and dryer, too. Overall, great. BUT, once I started actually using this and removing it from the duvet, the buttons would come off so easily (and of course roll under the bed to the point where I can't reach them). To fix this, I sewed my own buttons onto the cover and they have yet to pop off. Another con is that I feel like the material stains really easily, whether it is from dog drool or a wet towel or lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric and construction
customer_reviews.text: On the plus side, this set machine washed and dried beautifully and does not hold wrinkles. The fabric is soft but holds the duvet in place well. It is a fairly lightweight fabric which is fine for a duvet cover. I'm impressed with the construction. It is well sewn with nicely finished seams. The cream color is quite deep, almost khaki or tan. The only downside for me is that the shams are very large for my standard size pillows leaving about four inches hanging empty. Perhaps most people ordering a king size use longer pillows. It is easy enough to fold the excess to the inside edge of each pillow for now until I can shorten them.
customer_reviews.author: JaneTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Garbage! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing "Egyptian" about this garbage! 100% plastic/polyester! Very deceptive description!! No ties ties inside the cover either, so your duvet will swim around in the cover with nothing holding it! Impossible to re-pack after you take it out of the cheap and outrageously tight packaging. Went straight in the trash as it's not worth the $30 to deal with the return process. I guess you get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: Tyson V.

customer_reviews.title: 6 months later, still amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this 6 months ago with a few other options and ultimately chose these. I just went back to see what brand to order another set and can't believe how affordable this was! Feels like a $100 duvet cover. Lasted 6 months of use and washes already with no evident wear. If you love cotton, get this! Update: So I'm a little disappointed with the white set that came in; previously I had the grey. The white feels and looks much thinner for some reason; it's actually so see-through that you can see the pillow tags inside.
customer_reviews.author: S. C.

customer_reviews.title: When I remove them from the package they did not feel anything like Egyptian cotton they didn't have to weight or the ...
customer_reviews.text: The advertisement was 1500 count Egyptian cotton 3-piece duvet & sham set. The packaging said 1500 count Egyptian cotton 3-piece duvet & sham set. When I removed them from the package they did not feel anything like Egyptian cotton they didn't have to weight or the texture of Egyptian cotton. I then read the tags sewn onto the duvet cover and the pillow shams 100% polyester! Bait and switch at its very best they should be ashamed
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M.

customer_reviews.title: Just OK.
customer_reviews.text: The duvet cover arrived in time and in good condition. It looks good, and I'm sure that it will suffice. However, I was expecting better quality. the product is flimsy, and made from the thinnest possible material. I will not leave a negative report with Amazon because my problem with the product is not really your fault, and I would not wish to say anything that would in any way damage your reputation. Maybe you could let me know about a similar product of better quality. I would be willing to pay the extra charge. I do not want to return the product because I have already begun to use it. thank you. Abraham Battat
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Battat

customer_reviews.title: The different colors have different qualities.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item in the burgundy color and it was a little nicer than this color. The burgundy one has corner ties to hold the down comforter in place, the camel did not. The manufacturing quality of the burgundy duvet also seemed better. The burgundy also had an appropriate number of buttons to close it, camel color seemed to fall short.
customer_reviews.author: Coats

customer_reviews.title: very light weight
customer_reviews.text: AS Duvets go. this is a nice choice for the price - I purchased a King - White - to fill with comforters I like to keep on my bed - The thread count is ok - it is soft but it is basically two king flat sheets sewed together. I have used it as a throw over my white comforters - the size is VERY generous - my only complaint is it is very light weight and see through. If you have light comforters white without much detail this is the duvet for you. I May because of the price and softness purchase the sage green and see if that will work (not see through) for Spring.
customer_reviews.author: Lancaster66

customer_reviews.title: Misleading - NOT Egyptian cotton. With stains. Poorly made: sewing not straight.
customer_reviews.text: The presentation is intentionally misleading. Amazon listed this as "Amazon's Choice for egyptian cotton duvet cover king." It is NOT cotton; it is microfiber. Very surprised at the high reviews of this product. The small stains on the product look like little smushed bugs; I can't imagine the conditions in which this Chinese product was made.
customer_reviews.author: Michael John

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I received a dry-clean only goose down comforter for Christmas and bought this cover to extend its life and provide me something to remove and wash. Little did I know that this would enhance the comforter with a super-soft cover that makes being under it like heaven! Love this product so much I'm going to get some more in different colors. It was super easy to put on and a few shakes once the comforter is in it smooths it all out. I have a king size comforter and managed to get it on myself with zero frustration in about 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana S.

customer_reviews.title: Not cotton
customer_reviews.text: I thought I order a cotton duvet cover but just notice it is 'Egyptian Quality' not 'Egyptian cotton' after I got it. This is some level of misleading, also adopted by some other duvet cover seller in Amazon. I don't think it is a terrible bargain, but I don't agree with the 'you got you pay for' type of reviews/comments. I am not willing to buy it if I know it is microfiber. I will keep using it for a while since I am too lazy to return it. Maybe I will have to buy another real cotton duvet cover later , not from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Deisai

customer_reviews.title: Paper thin and STINKS!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE this duvet is paper thin, thinner than a sheet. It is soft, but is completely translucent. The package arrived undamaged, no stains, but I immediately threw it in the wash. Once I took it out it STINKS!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I have my in laws arriving today, with no time to get a new duvet. I rewashed it with lots of fabric softner, and dried on low with dryer sheets, hoping to mask the smell. Nope! Still stinks horribly! I will probably have to run out and buy a new duvet, as I don't see how anybody could sleep with that smell!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: so it surprised me that this duvet was actually quite nice. The only thing that gives it away are ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 100% cotton snob, so it surprised me that this duvet was actually quite nice. The only thing that gives it away are the unfinished button holes and the shams...You can tell by the stiching on the shams, that they're not top quality. That being said, however, they are only 29.99...So, you do get what you pay for. But, if you don't feel like spending a fortune on a duvet, love the look and feel of ALL cotton, then this is a pretty good deal. Of course, I haven't washed them yet, since I just received them, but all in all, they're not bad...at all
customer_reviews.author: Milla

customer_reviews.title: Used Soiled product sold
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in June. I already had one that I bought which was good but I got hair dye on it. I bought another one and am having company so finally opening it. See the stains? You can even feel it. Gross. Also, look at the color of the pillow cases. They don't even match. They're super off white. Not a match at all. Unfortunately I have to eat this since it's outside of my return timeframe. Who would think to open it and inspect that someone would sell you a used bed linen. Simply wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay cover, but why aren't there any tie downs?
customer_reviews.text: The cover is fairly light. Very thin fabric. It feels fairly soft. The stitching is ok. Buttons on mine to close it up. I have a king size and there are zero tie downs. Really surprised not to see at least some in the corners for a cover this size. Without them the duvet goes every which way in the cover. Really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: WASH IT FIRST
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package, the smell knocked you over! I immediately put it in the washing machine, as the package directed. I thought it was cotton when I ordered it. It's polyester. Tried it anyway. First night I slept to hot. Don't think it's going to work out.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Riley

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this duvet cover! It is a quality material that is not thin and flimsy. The feel is very soft, heavy thread count, and doesn't wrinkle. It's just the right weight in the summer to add a comfortable night's sleep without making the bed sheets feel hot. (I use only the duvet cover in the summertime minus the comforter) I already have two more colors in my shopping cart! This is a great gift for newlyweds (along with sheets and a comforter) to give a beautiful look to their bedroom. It looks like it costs much more than it does. Thank you for offering a quality product for a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Underwood Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Post
customer_reviews.text: It's a misleading post. It's sorted as cotton, but only upon scouring the product page will you know it's microfiber. I made the mistake and bought it regardless. As far as microfiber goes, it's fine. The listing is misleading in many ways and it should be more prominent that this is made of microfiber. Egyptian "quality" is a buzzword to allude to cotton without actually being cotton. Also the brand "HC Collection" is meant to be similar to the reputable brand "Hotel Collection."
customer_reviews.author: Shourie

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing luxury about this product. Looks very cheap and poorly made. The comforter duvet is the worst; the button closers have almost all fallen off so I only have 1 left on it. On top of that, the material is very cheap so it accumulates little lint balls making it extremely uncomfortable. I also noticed that there was discoloration after one wash (didn't even know this was possible with white). Guess it was my fault for expecting more from a $20 sheet set but this is beyond subpar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, won't last.
customer_reviews.text: The Duvet cover is indeed very soft but it's so thin, you can see the pillow tags and design through the shams and most of the buttons fell off after the first wash. My dog sometimes jumps on the bed and will leave a couple of paw prints on the cover but because of whatever the material is, it doesn't respond to stain removers and the stains don't come out. I've washed it a few times now and the stains are still pretty prominent. The rest of the buttons have all fallen off now so it's now being used as a doc bed cover.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Grease spots on it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift but when I pre-washed it, found there are 'grease' or oil spots on it. Noticed other reviews mentioned this and I thought it was a fluke but no. Sorely disappointed. Do NOT buy this set
customer_reviews.author: Gretta123

customer_reviews.title: Not like photo at all, please be aware! Not a comforter type thing!
customer_reviews.text: So... Just so others know, the photo is very misleading. I bought it not knowing what a duvet is. From the photo it should be a comforter type this g and 2 pillow shams. It's instead a flat sheet thing you... I guess.. put over a comforter?? I'm not sure what kind of use this is at all except painful to try to stuff a comforter into. Very odd product. My bad for not knowing what a duvet is, but now I have a useless duvet thing and no comforter. Beware it's not like the photo
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: It is very soft. The color was just like it showed in the picture. I have a CA. King, and everything fit very nicely. The material is a little thinner than I would have liked, and they only used single stitching. Perfect foe a guest room that you want to spruce up. Where it wouldn't get much wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Desdoolittle

customer_reviews.title: Lovely fabric, needed some corner ties
customer_reviews.text: This duvet cover is a nice value for the price; lightweight and smooth, with color being very close to the picture. Quite easy to tuck in the duvet and the buttons were covered. The only complaint I have is that there are no internal ties for the loops that hold the duvet inside the cover. So I’ll have to add those myself.
customer_reviews.author: ICGRRL

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Duvet!
customer_reviews.text: We recently needed to update our bedding since we painted our room. I was looking for something that didn't cost a fortune yet still looked nice. We decided to go with the duvet and couldn't be more pleased. We purchased an insert that's the same size so we don't have any issues with the comforter shifting inside the duvet. The one thing I wish it had were tie straps inside to hold a duvet in place more but it won't affect my rating. It's very luxurious looking and super soft to the feel. A great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: buzymomof2

customer_reviews.title: Good Product and Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: The duvet cover was a great color match to our bedroom remodel and fit the duvet comforter very nicely. It has a button over closure at the bottom which provides a very streamlined look. The cover is very soft and does not wrinkle and lays very flat on the bed for a smooth look. Only reason it did not get 5 stars was the weight of the fabric seems a bit light. It would be nice if it had a higher weight to give a more luxurious/tailored look. However it is very nice and looks great on our bed. Overall very pleased with this selection.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G.

customer_reviews.title: 100% Polyester MICROFIBER - DONT GET FOOLED
customer_reviews.text: This add is soooo misleading stating EGYPTION 1500 THREAD ... none of that refers to MICROFIBER which this is! Don’t get fooled like I did by their description. MADE IN CHINA 100% POLYESTER Unfortunate for me I only realized AFTER I threw them in the washer Complete disappointment .... Amazon, screen your sellers descriptions
customer_reviews.author: SHELDON HOFFMAN

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I really LOVE the comfort of this duvet cover. It is very soft and snugly. It has helped make my bed almost perfect. BUT I must note, I wish they would ADD BUTTONS to the corners on the inside so that the duvet does not slide around and shift inside. This does happen often. It would be an easy thing to fix especially since may duvets come with loops in the corners for buttons to hold them in place. Also, another note, DO NOT spray wrinkle spray on this item. It will leave spray marks that do not come out (even after washing).
customer_reviews.author: M Neal

customer_reviews.title: Silky soft - great value
customer_reviews.text: This is the softest duvet I’ve ever had! I don’t usually like polyester because it feels cheap and retains heat. This is much nicer than I expected. It feels silky soft, washes well, and doesn’t wrinkle. It does hold onto pet hair but it washes off well. I would have given 5 stars, but it lacks ties inside the corners, so there’s no way to secure my down comforter in place. But for $20, it’s a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Lawyer For JusticeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is incredibly soft, exactly what we wanted. The Gray is a light gray, but a stunning one! There are no ties in the top part of the duvet cover to attach the top piece within to, however I haven't always been a fan of those, so I don't see it as a problem, just an FYI. The bottom closure uses clear buttons that are hidden with the flap in the manner that they button. My husband and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Di

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set a month before I ever opened it, waiting on the room to be finished with crown molding before changing out the bedding. I was so very disappointed in this purchase! Stains from God knows what...stitching was looped and missing, just pathetic quality. Get what you pay for I guess. They are happy I’m too lazy to package it all up and return. Do not buy this crap
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and low quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a thin, poorly made duvet cover that looks like it was made as a girl scout project. It looks cheap and does not look at all like the picture. It does not finish a bed well or bump up the look of the room. Spend a little more and find a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: First of all you can't tell what is the top or bottom. Second it has no ties in the corners for the insert and is not even on any level. Shocked at the positive reviews. Poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: BEST duvet set I've ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: The thread count is as advertised. The fabric is unbelievably soft and dirt resistant. My acid test for bedding is can it take a hot water, normal washing without puckering or coarsening and THIS duvet set passed with flying colors. I've got my go-to company for bedding if the quality is like this for all of their products. Definitely worth the price. I'm thinking that the bad reviews are from people who are competitors. Faux Egyptian cotton or not, this is worth every penny! Buying more duvets and sheets ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: m wright

customer_reviews.title: Ugh
customer_reviews.text: Not Egyptian cotton. Wife was pist, wanted to shoot myself listening to her complain about what seemed like such a small issue.
customer_reviews.author: michael hornbacher

customer_reviews.title: comfy and soft
customer_reviews.text: The cover is really soft to the touch, and comfortable to be under. Though the end side (with all the buttons) can't be closed 100% (the gap between each button is too far, and the far sides of both ends are a bit awkwardly designed, it doesn't take away its value for the money I spent on this item. If the "comfort" is more important to you than the "look and design", then this is the right product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Wan

customer_reviews.title: IT'S NOT LUXURY!!! VERY CHEAP!
customer_reviews.text: I was fooled by the description. the fabric is very thin and loosely sewn together. Its quite frankly the cheapest sheets I have ever seen. The stitching is awful. Its just so thin! I get that microfiber is supposed to be thinner, but I have other microfiber sheets that feel more well made. The part of the duvet where you button up is just so lose and doesn't close up nicely. JUST VERY CHEAP....
customer_reviews.author: Keaokun

customer_reviews.title: Worst product, quality Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Was supposed to be a high thread count. The higher the count the heavier, thicker, and weight the sheet is supposed to be. This item is no joke see through upon removing from package. I gave two stars bc Amazon refunded me, the return was easy thanks to kohls drop off. The products is technically claiming something that is no true. I vote to have this subpar item removed from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: SK22

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, perfect color selection photos
customer_reviews.text: I'm more than happy with this purchase. It's excellent value for money, and you can't beat the convenience. It would have taken me several weeks to find and purchase what I found in seconds online and had in hand a couple days later. I was hesitant at first because color is pretty much 70% of picking a duvet cover, but the color matched the picture perfectly--there wasn't non need to repaint, buy different throws and cushions or anything! Definitely worth anyone's time. And money. I'll house the brand regularly from now on (I'm an unrecovered linens freak).
customer_reviews.author: tom miller

customer_reviews.title: No corner ties but very soft!
customer_reviews.text: I have a sheet set from this same company so I decided that a duvet cover would up my comfort level.. it is as soft as the sheets, but I’m disappointed there are no internal ties. I had to add some using scrap fabric. There were a few grey “stains” where you get from rubbing fabric against metal, so I had to wash twice to get those out. There are a few stray threads here and there on the seams. Otherwise, I’m happy with the end result and will be keeping. Just we aware there are no ties (but there really should be...)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with how soft the material is on this duvet cover. My only complaint is that it doesn't have any ties or snaps in the corners to help hold the duvet in place while inside. If you are a crazy sleeper that means potentially having your duvet bunched up inside by morning time. I am going to look into making my own ties for it to prevent this from happening. Otherwise, the price and the softness are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Cronin

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Though it was very good quality for the price. Very soft and very easy to put on. I purchased a queen size to fit on my king down comforter. My comforter has lost a lot of it fill and my king size duvet cover was way too big for it. This was the best thing I could do instead of buying a new expensive down comforter. I will be buy more in other colors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and beautiful color!
customer_reviews.text: This duvet is very soft and well made! I washed it before putting it on the bed and it only got softer! the color is gorgeous and the stitching is very durable. The only reason I gave it 4 stars was because I usually prefer duvet covers with tabs on the inside corners to tie to my duvet cover to keep it from sliding around inside. also, I prefer a zipper closure over a button closure. But for the price, this is well worth it! Bed time is my FAVORITE time of day, so I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: brooke sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Buttons come off very easily after washing
customer_reviews.text: Update: I purchased this back in August and by November all the buttons have popped off after roughly 10 washes ... without the buttons the duvet rides up and gets tangled up in the comforter. Such a hassle and will not purchase a duvet with buttons again!!
customer_reviews.author: Abby Gaudreau

customer_reviews.title: Can;t go wrong for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance and bought this for our queen sized bed, without approval first from my girlfriend. Big risk. lol. But, though she wasn't happy I did it, she quickly agreed it was nice and looked great. We haven't washed it, yet, so not sure how it will hold up, long term, but so far, so good. Like I said for the money you really can't go wrong here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful purple duvet  with button closure.
customer_reviews.text: The duvet is a beautiful purple color. It’s very soft and looks great. I purchased the duvet before realizing it had a button closure. Didn’t cancel and gave it a try. I didn’t like the buttons. That’s my mistake and my preference of a zippered closure. I am going to keep it because it’s a great purple color and so soft. Hope the company offers a duvet with a zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Book lover

customer_reviews.title: Overall love it
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I didn't have any clue what a duvet was until I googled it but I used it to cover a comforter to make it match the sheets I also bought from them and it looks great and you wouldn't even be able to tell it's in there. Basically it some like a giant pillow case for you to put a duvet or comforter in to fill it and it buttons at one in and it was pretty easy to figure out how to get it in there. Looks and feels exactly like the sheets which I recommend buying with it. They are soft and feel amazing and don't make you too hot or cold
customer_reviews.author: renee bass

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable soft
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable soft! I cant believe the price. Fits a queen comforter with room but not too loose as to look weird. Wish it had buttons or something to hold the comforter to the top of the duvet but we just got it today so we will see how it holds up over time and if it keeps from sliding down. So so soft. It was wrinkled from the package but we didnt put it in the dryer so maybe try that. So so soft
customer_reviews.author: Yellowstone

customer_reviews.title: I am more than satisfied with these purchases
customer_reviews.text: I have previously purchased this duvet cover in the yellow color as well and purchased the navy to help with our rotation. These covers are buttery soft! Our other cover has been washed almost weekly for the last three months and I can say that the color is starting to fad and a few buttons at the closure have popped off. But for $25, I am more than satisfied with these purchases! I would buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok value for price and polyester not Cotton!
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok quality but I guess cheap for the cheap price. This is 100% polyester not cotton! This could be an ok duvet or also serve as a protecter to go inside another duvet. It is very thin and soft however. Fine for a college kid or kids room.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A.

customer_reviews.title: ok for the price but...
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is an ok cover. Not for warmer weather as it is very warm. Yes it is soft but it has very few buttons on the bottom and the corners of my duvet keep coming our. I am putting it away till winter and I am adding a few velcro strips to keep is closed better. For the price it good, just be advised you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Druckenmiller

customer_reviews.title: My comfy new Hotel Luxury 3pc Duvet Cover Set
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful I love it so soft and great when crawling into bed after having a busy day! Fits perfectly on my antique bed. The color is beautiful and just what I wanted! Thank you so much Sara T! Here is the product I bought and will buy more from this great American Company Bed Linens and More!!! Hotel Luxury 3pc Duvet Cover Set-1500 Thread Count Egyptian Quality Ultra Silky Soft Premium Bedding Collection-Queen Size Sage
customer_reviews.author: Maryrose Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand cover!
customer_reviews.text: Similar to pictured, but I would say the green is slightly darker, at least in my room, than the picture. I love this brand because I have dogs that sleep on the bed and have had experiences with some covers that attract hair and even the washing machine won’t bring it all off. Not this brand. It’s cool, soft, beautiful and doesn’t hold dog hair. I really do love it!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Misleading product name
customer_reviews.text: Without the misleading title, this product itself is a soft microfiber duvet cover decent for the price. However, the marketing team decided to trick us customers with a borderline scam title of "1500 thread count" which only applies to cotton. As such, I cannot review this product based on its actual quality but based on the title - bringing its star down from 4 to 2. For those who buy this, it is way too warm for an all-season duvet cover.
customer_reviews.author: Hei C.

customer_reviews.title: I wish they were 100% cotton
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this comforter cover. I thought it was 100% cotton. It isn't. However, it is soft, warm and wrinkle-free. It looks nice on our bed. The pillow covers that are included are very basic and plain. The cover helps our down comforter keep in the heat. We need fewer blankets since we purchased this duvet cover. It is also easy to wash. I was surprised by how nice it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Merry Zavala

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cozy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the light grey color and it comes off more of a blue grey but I still enjoy it. I also like the buttons. It’s been very soft and cozy and will purchase again. Great price for a great product :) I attached photo shows how it’s more blue then grey. Hope you enjoy my dog as well. :) he’s a good boy
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Soft, soft soft!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of the cover set! I was a little concerned that the Camel color would be darker than in your photo but it was spot on! I did purchase the king for my queen size bed and very happy I did. I did do a quick wash and dry and it turned out just fine. I will say that I never had a cover without a zipper and that this just laid out like a sheet. Called a friend and together we got the job done
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Know
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize this was a duvet "cover". I probably wouldn't have bought it if I knew it was just a cover. I knew that price was too good to be true. Either way, the price was reasonable for a cover. I don't own a duvet yet but when I do, I'll be sure to use this one. I thought the brown really worked for me but I'm not crazy about it. I'll probably get the blue one some time soon.
customer_reviews.author: Marlo

customer_reviews.title: Not Egyptian Cotton but decent buy
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is smooth, but not Egyptian cotton quality nor 1500 count. Simplistic design. Easy to use. Was out for delivery an additional day & misdelivered, so I rcv the pkg 3 days after the expected date Not opaque. I do not recommend using this to cover any comforter that is not a solid white. If quilted u will see every dimple Washes fine. No static. Wrinkles fell out. Takes well to a fabric steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Budderluv

customer_reviews.title: Sage NOT Sage
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing price for this item. It arrived packaged very well and certainly with no stains or odor as others have commented. It is just IK. Certainly not Hotel Quality or at least any nice hotel. My problem was that the Sage color was olive and not saw. It totally did not work for me. You will definitely need to add pillows and or throws to s bed with this as it looks like s big shapeless blob on the bed. Very boring. That being said, it was certainly inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved the feel of this straight out of the package. It seems to be very good quality. After wrestling with the king size duvet, I got it all situated on the bed and it laid very nicely. The buttons were a bit annoying to do up (I should have got a zippered one) but with the buttons facing DOWN and at the END of the bed they aren't a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lauryn

customer_reviews.title: Never have to adjust a comfort inside a cover again!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone knows the struggle of having to struggle to get your comfort back into the corners of your duvet cover - well I don't anymore! I have YET to have to adjust my comforter inside this. It was so easy to put on and did I mention that this is the most comfortable and softest thing in my house! I bought another one for a guest room because I love them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Arissa

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: I was worried before receiving it. Initially I purchased another duvet cover set sold on Amazon which was more expensive and the best seller. However, that one was so cheap quality and its color was not even matched the picture. So I had to return it. Then I searched on YouTube and found this duvet cover set was recommended. I’m so glad I got this set. It’s much better quality and with better price. I love it! The purple color is pretty. Highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Mismatched sham styles, but otherwise fine
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting luxury for the price point, but I at least expected all the pieces to match. The included pillow shams were two different styles - one with a stitched border and one without. Not the end of the world since I have other patterned shams I can use with the solid navy duvet, just a little disappointed with the inconsistent styles. Overall, still a good value for the price point. The duvet fits over our king sized comforter and will serve its purpose (tired of weekly trips to the cleaners with a king comforter because of cat hair).
customer_reviews.author: M. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: So very soft and comfy.
customer_reviews.text: I love the soft feel of the material. When I opened the package and removed the duvet cover in one area the material is scuffed up. Like sandpaper had been rubbed over it. I am not sure what could cause that. But since I need it now I will just keep it and hope that future washing doesn't worsen the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: So soft and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this duvet cover for a few weeks and I couldn’t be happier with my choice. I bought in hopes to be a “placeholder” until I found one i really loved. The price was what attracted me for that reason. But then after using it, there is no need to look any further! Don’t let the affordable price fool you, it’s top quality. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Cartier

customer_reviews.title: No ties.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is just okay. I understand that it is priced low, but it really should have ties to hold the duvet in place. Not having them makes it difficult to put the cover on and to make the bed in general. The fabric is fine. It feels like mediocre bed sheets, both in thickness and softness. I’ll probably get a higher quality set and use this as a backup.
customer_reviews.author: Krysta

customer_reviews.title: Returning product.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I am unhappy with product and am returnung it.. Description says made from egyptian cotton and it's made of polyester and is microfiber. Product is made in China and the company claims their product is made in the U.S.A. There was holes in the stitching by the opening of the insert. The pillow cases were way to big for standard king size. How it looks online all nice and elegant is not how it looks once you put it on your bed, looked like crap.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla Shoaf

customer_reviews.title: My duvet is not a pillow, where is the closure?
customer_reviews.text: It is somewhat soft feeling but..... there are no buttons or ties to hold the duvet in place and there is no closure on the bottom just some folded over fabric in the bottom corners that do nothing. So my comforter could just slide out the bottom. Its slightly irritating that they state button or zipper closure but it doesn't have either. Unless for a show bed that no one uses do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Squeaky

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: The product was nothing as advertised 🤷 it looked like two king size sheets sewn together what a Rip off, Amazon you need regulate products to assure consumers are getting what is advertised on your site, this was truly a Rip off and I'm still pissed at the false advertising of the seller 😠😠
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT WASHINGTON

customer_reviews.title: cheap.
customer_reviews.text: it doesn't have ties in the corners to anchor the blanket in place. it only has a couple buttons on the bottom. doesnt fit right and overall looks cheap and sloppy.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Feel and price
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It’s really soft and comfortable. Most duvet covers are stiff and rough feeling. I do wish it had inner ties and a zipper closure. Price would probably be higher, but more convenient. I would not hesitate to purchase another of this product.
customer_reviews.author: t.thompson

customer_reviews.title: Ok but great!
customer_reviews.text: No instructions with the product. I know it should be self explanatory but does the enclosure have a specific location, top bottom or either side. This being unclear makes it a bit difficult determining how to insert your particular comforter as no two are the same. If it is that the duvets are universal then it should say that. Also if they are universal then it doesn't quite fit my comforter. The material does feel really nice and if it fit my comforter correctly I think it would look great!

customer_reviews.title: Worse Quality Than Previous Order
customer_reviews.text: I bought this same duvet cover from the same seller 4 years ago, and it was very soft and thick, very good quality. After a few years I decided to buy another of the same, well this time it's MUCH worse! The fabric is not soft or thick, you can see through it. With the previous duvet you couldn't see through it. Feels like very cheap quality. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: california-mass girl

customer_reviews.title: Super soft & comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Soft as a cloud!! I wanted something soft & easy to clean, & this duvet cover fits what I was looking for exactly. My puppy enjoys curling up with it as well! The gray does appear a bit greenish under certain lights, but most of the time you can tell it is gray. I've only been using it for 4 days, so I cannot rate durability yet. I washed it before inserting my duvet & putting it on my bed & there were no issues.
customer_reviews.author: embee007

customer_reviews.title: but seems like polyester, and the hem is unfinished
customer_reviews.text: I decided to purchase even after reading the mixed reviews because this product was still highly rated. I shouldn't have. It is soft, but seems like polyester, and the hem is unfinished. Bummer! I guess the price was too good to be true.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Seems great!
customer_reviews.text: A little bit larger than my queen blanket - but it works well and looks great! I am afraid that after a few washes it might start pilling because of how it feels fabric wise - just seems like it might. Appears to be very well made, survived a first wash like a champ and its first few days of use! I would suggest anyone trying for a quick change to get one!
customer_reviews.author: Knive_k

customer_reviews.title: NO TIES
customer_reviews.text: Ours did not come with corner ties as our previous one did. Very disappointed that I wasted the money. I can’t retothis item because out of the box I washed it prior to putting it on our bed. Won’t buy again as it is not as described.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Lee Alvin

product_meta.title: HC COLLECTION - 1500 Thread Count Egyptian Quality Duvet Cover Set Full Queen Size, 3pc Luxury Soft, Queen Gray
product_meta.description:
Size:Queen| Color:Gray

HC Collection
Ultimate blend of craftsmanship and elegance, our linens are designed to offer you a unique and sophisticated sleeping experience.

BENEFITS OF OUR DUVET COVER

1.PROTECT THE LIFE OF YOUR COMFORTER: Down comforters can be an expensive investment. Our duvet covers will protect your investment by easily sliding over your comforter keeping it safe from tears, stains, sweat, and losing feathers.
2.EASY INEXPENSIVE TO CARE FOR: Our duvet covers are machine washable, simply slip off your duvet cover and pop into the washing machine! No more expensive trips to the drycleaners with your down comforter! 
3.TRANSFORM THE LOOK OF YOUR BEDROOM: Our duvet covers come in a large array of colors, and are an inexpensive way to change the look of your bedroom by simply switching out the cover! 
4.HEALTY SLEEPING ENVIORNMENT: Our duvet covers are perfect for allergy sufferers! Unlike other fabrics, microfiber repels dust mites and other allergens, allergy sufferers will wake up feeling refreshed!

BENEFITS OF MICROFIBER
Microfibers are distinctive for its unique thinness and strength. Woven tightly, it guarantees extra strength and durability. This fabric has desirable properties such as stain and wrinkle resistant, breathing ability, luxurious appearance and easy cleaning. Microfiber products are also the best choices for allergy sufferers. Allergens like dust mites and pollen cannot get in the densely weaved strands. In addition it considered environmentally friendly. Cotton takes a lot of water to grow and many pesticides are used to grow cotton that causes serious pollution.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE 
At Bed Linens and More, we guarantee your 100% satisfaction! If within 30 days you are not 100% satisfied return your product for a full refund! NO QUESTIONS ASKED!
feature_bullets: TOP QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: 3pc Set - Full/Queen Duvet Cover 90" x 90" , 2 Pillow Shams 20"x 26", Duvet Cover made from Highest Quality Double Brushed Microfiber grains. The Unique weaving process of Our Double Brushed Microfiber bedding results in a dense fabric having thin strands and a smooth texture more durable and softer than the highest thread count egyptian cotton!

MONEY SAVING SOLUTION: Our duvet covers act like a giant pillow case for your down comforter- making it the perfect solution to protect and increase the life of your comforter. No more expensive trips to the drycleaners our duvet covers are MACHINE WASHABLE and a seamless integration with your existing bedding! Large array of colors matching our Sheet sets, Pillowcases & Bed Skirts

LASTING PERFORMANCE: Our Top Selling Quality Bedding is made with the HIGHEST QUALITY FABRIC so you know it lasts! Double Brushed for OPTIMAL SOFTNESS YOU CAN SEE AND FEEL! Wrinkle and Fade Resistant; HYPOALLERGENIC, Resistant to Dust Mites, Vibrant Colors made exclusively not to fade with washings!

TRANSFORM LOOK OF YOUR BEDROOM: Like changing clothes for your bed, our duvet covers are an easy inexpensive way to transform the look of your bedroom with a simple switch of a cover. Available in a large array of colors to suit anyones needs, simply swap out your duvet cover for easy changes from season to season.

LIFETIME WARRANTY : Just try our products and if you don’t absolutely love them let us know and we will refund your purchase price. We are so confident you will love our products like our other 5-star reviewers! You will be amazed at the customer service you receive after the sale! You have nothing to lose so ORDER NOW and consider buying an extra set for your loved ones. Makes the perfect gift for any occasion!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars14,725 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: Free lifetime warranty included with purchase. Bed linens and more is the only authorized seller for products being sold on this detail page, purchasing these items from another seller may result in you receiving a fake counterfeit product and will not be covered under our warranty.
